name: Onecut - Feb 2019
projectDescriptionList: Cut your sprite into any piece you like
Self taught all the trigogeometry math (finding line itersection, triangle area etc...)
Support all platform, Unity version 2017 aboved

name: Math Parser - June 2019
projectDescriptionList: Insert math expression as input, output answer. As simple as that.
Work with bunch of math function, see documentation link for more detail

name: Ultimate Scroll View - Dec 2019
projectDescriptionList: Support Top-Down, Left-Right, Right-Left three scrolling direction.
Recycle your UI component, greatly improve performance if you have large dataset to manage.
Been pressure test at one of the HTC's project.
